nodes.text: Durgen's Star was a white dwarf star that was located in the Durgen's Star system, a part of the Gordian Reach sector in the Trans-Hydian portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It was situated on the hyperlane known as the Junction-Tierell Loop, which connected it to the Povanaria and Trinovat systems.

The star was circled by a debris field of tumbling rock and ice fragments that was a remnant of an ancient supernova. According to spacer tales, prospectors at some point discovered unusual, unimaginably ancient technology of unknown purpose in the Durgen's Star debris, and by 43 ABY, generations of mining operations, lured by those rumors, had searched the debris field for anything worth extracting.
Durgen's Star was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it in grid square Q-6.
